skins.shipDescription: Fletcher-class destroyer C Nicholas, Hull Number DD-449!
skins.selfIntroduction: I'm Nicholas, DD-449... Although my hull number is at the bottom of the list, I was actually the first Fletcher-class to be commissioned and launched... I mainly provided fire support, and... I contributed to the sinking of Jintsuu and the rescue of Helena, but I don't have much else noteworthy to my name... If there is nothing else you want to know, can I go back?
skins.acquisition: I'm Nicholas, the first Fletcher-class ship to be launched... I'd rather stay at the base than head out to battle... You don't mind, right?
skins.login: I'm different from you, Commander. I'd prefer to just stay here and not go anywhere else...
skins.details: Zzzz... Oh, C-Commander? Are you gonna say that I've been slacking off too much and now I have to sortie?!
skins.secretaryIdle1: Sakura Empire torpedoes... that's scary stuff...
skins.secretaryIdle2: Commander, how about you learn from Helena and just leave me to my own devices?
skins.secretaryIdle3: I really don't feel like training... not at all...

skins.shipDescription: Commander, what month is it...? I think I overslept a bit... am I taller than I was before? *Yawn*... Gotta be because I slept the whole time...
skins.acquisition: Commander, what month is it...? I think I overslept a bit... am I taller than I was before? *Yawn*... Gotta be because I slept the whole time...
skins.details: You can let me handle all the work you don't have to go outdoors for...
skins.secretaryIdle1: These torpedoes... could work as a half-decent pillow replacement.
skins.secretaryIdle2: It's not like I sleep all day EVERY day... But that's not to say I like moving around when awake...
skins.secretaryIdle3: Nicholas has a dream... A dream of becoming a statue...

skins.shipDescription: I love doing relief missions as a nurse... I don't need to go outside or take part in any training, I just need to look after injured people... What about treating them? No worries, they just need to rest and they'll get better.
skins.acquisition: I love doing relief missions as a nurse... I don't need to go outside or take part in any training, I just need to look after injured people... What about treating them? No worries, they just need to rest and they'll get better.
skins.login: Medical staff are valuable and should stay in the back... Frontline duty? That stuff is Vestal's job...
skins.details: I need to control my sleepiness when treating people on the battlefield. *Yawn*... I'm working on it...
skins.secretaryIdle1: This syringe contains Radford's sweetie candy... It won't hurt... You won't feel a thing...
skins.secretaryIdle2: You don't feel so good, do you? Don't worry about me, just stay in bed and rest...
skins.secretaryIdle3: Some of my patients can be pretty problematic... That's when I just dump them on Vestal...
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: You must have suddenly gotten very sick...

skins.shipDescription: Merry Christmas, Commander... I'm your present, probably... Would you mind closing the lid for me so I can sleep a bit more... Zzz...
skins.acquisition: Merry Christmas, Commander... I'm your present, probably... Would you mind closing the lid for me so I can sleep a bit more... Zzz...
skins.details: Huh? I don't get the day off on Christmas? ... Fine, give me five more minutes... Just five more minutes... Zzzzz...
skins.secretaryIdle1: What I want for Christmas...? Don't really care, as long as I can get enough sleep...
skins.secretaryIdle2: Going out on an errand? Have fun... You want me to come with you? I don't wanna...
skins.secretaryIdle3: Helena, wanna take a nap together? It's really snug inside this box...

skins.shipDescription: Commander, did you also come to play in the pool? ...Me? Fletcher said I have to help clean up because I was slacking off... Mm, watch your step~
